DOC.brief_summary: STUDY OBJECTIVE To confirm incidence in-hospital postoperative complication adult surgical patient Africa . STUDY DESIGN Seven day , African national multi-centre prospective observational cohort study adult ( ≥18 year ) patient undergo surgery . Patients follow maximum 30 day . We follow original International Surgical Outcomes Study ( ISOS ) study design . The primary outcome in-hospital postoperative complication adult surgical patient Africa . Secondary outcome include in-hospital mortality relationship postoperative complication postoperative mortality . The intention present representative sample surgical outcome across African country . This study run February March 2016 .
